name: The End Of You Too
description:
In a harsh world, one might choose to escape. 

You're a limbless creature, time is ticking, but you'll find that hidden around you there is just what you need to make yourself... I don't know, a pair of wings?

The sun is just the place you need to be. Find your way to it, careful not to fall.

Development team:
  • Giulia Bonelli
  • Francesco Dami
  • Federico Espositi
  • Gianluca Martena
  • Davide Montalbano
Install Instructions:
  1. download the executable
  2. unzip it
  3. enjoy!

For Linux and Windows users: download, unzip and you get a folder. In it you find the executable to play!

We suggest you use a gamepad for a better experience.
